content.text:
HON. KEVIN YODER

                               of kansas

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 1, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. YODER. Mr. Speaker, on Roll Call No. 591 on the motion to suspend 
the rules and pass H.R. 2521--the South Carolina Peanut Parity Act of 
2017, I am not recorded because I was home in my district. Had I been 
present, I would have voted aye.
content.speaker: Mr. YODER
